updateInfo.title: The Next Evolution
updateInfo.desc: Canvas. New technologies. Better than ever before. Set sail for new possibilities with Caravel, the next evolution of education software.

updateInfo.title: New Horizons
features: App updates no longer delete app settings unnecessarily.
Error handling extended to course navigation.
Fixed missing images in course navigation.
Allow clearing cache data only from account page.
Show total storage used in account page.
Tweaked tooltip animation to be less jittery.
Tweaked theme colors to fix contrast and color.
